description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is your last stand. Battle an endless swarm of enemy drones as you defend the gates to Earth. Control your turrets and unleash carnage to protect mankind.
description.short: This is your last stand. Battle an endless swarm of enemy drones as you defend the gates to Earth. Control your turrets and unleash carnage to protect mankind.
